about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate developer focusing on building modern, responsive, and user-friendly web applications. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive designs.

items.title: Problem Solver
items.description: I don't just write code; I find efficient solutions to complex business problems.

items.title: Fast Learner
items.description: Adapting to new technologies and frameworks rapidly to stay ahead of the curve.

items.title: User-Centric
items.description: Creating intuitive experiences that prioritize user engagement and satisfaction.

items.title: Reading
items.description: I like to read about AI and new technology.

items.title: Sports
items.description: I always say that if I want a strong mind, I have to maintain a healthy body.

items.title: Finance
